name: VR HORROR
description:
This virtual reality game requires a mobile VR headset and sound to play. Hold the trigger down to move in the direction you are looking in.

This is a virtual reality horror game for mobile virtual reality headsets such as Google Cardboard VR. Works best with headphones.


COMPATIBLE VR ( Virtual Reality) HEADSETS
Google Cardboard VR
Stooksy
Merge VR
Durovis Dive VR
Refugio 3D
VRTX One
ANTVR
VR Smartview
ColorCross
VRTRIA
Nibiru
View-Master

Learn more about Google Cardboard here:
https://www.google.com/get/cardboard/
